Fern O’Shaughnessy
Connecting top Data & AI talent with innovative HealthTechs worldwide | Storm3
⚡ Principal Search Engineer ⚡HealthTech Scale-upREMOTECompetitive base ($200,000 upwards) + equityInterested in joining a company that is totally revolutionizing the nutrition space? And leading all things data / technology?Storm3 is working with a D2C scaleup, recognized as the "go to" in their space, and focused on improving healthcare. You will be working on cutting edge projects, and will utilize skills in GenAI, LLM and ML Ops to bring a better experience to patients and customers. You will have the opportunity to be a technical leader, and to take ownership for projects and the mentorship of more junior team members.This is a Staff level role in which you will work directly with the exec level leadership.Responsibilities:Provide technical leadership of overall architecture, analytics approaches, performance monitoring, continuing improvementBe a hands-on leader of ML EngineersWork closely cross-functionally with engineering, product, and other data teamsRequirements:10+ years of experience of AI experience, the majority of which should involve NLP, and deep learningDeep knowledge of AI and LLMsHave experience on the 'backend' of Machine Learning, working with architecture and APIs Experience with Elasticsearch is necessary Experience building, scaling and supporting large-scale data infrastructure systems in production Have a Masters or PhD in Comp Sci, Data Science, Statistics, Mathematics, or equivalentExperience with D2C and/or consumer apps would be great!Why apply:Competitive base salary (regardless of location in USA)Equity - dependent on experience but can be significant for this level of roleOpportunity to join fast growing and well-funded start upHealth Insurance🌎 The position is completely remote📧 Interested in applying? Please reach out to fern.oshaughnessy@storm3.com.⚡ Storm3 is a HealthTech recruitment firm with clients across London, Europe and North America. To discuss open opportunities or career options, please visit our website www.storm3.com and follow the Storm3 Linked In page for the latest jobs and intel
